-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A hexpat backend for blaze-html.
--   
--   Allows you to generate hexpat node trees using blaze syntax.
@package blaze-html-hexpat
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Renderer that supports rendering to expat forests
--   
--   Warning: because this renderer doesn't directly create the output, but
--   rather an XML tree representation, it is impossible to render
--   pre-escaped text. This means that <tt>preEscapedString</tt> will
--   produce the same output as <tt>string</tt>. This also applies to the
--   functions <tt>preEscapedText</tt>, <tt>preEscapedTextValue</tt>...
module Text.Blaze.Renderer.Hexpat

-- | Type used as list of nodes
type Forest = [Node ByteString ByteString]

-- | Render HTML to an expat forest
renderHtml :: Html -> Forest
